languages.text: "Договоренность между вашей предшественницей и Лорд-инквизитором требовала доставить меня до Футфола, не далее. Не имею желания более испытывать ваше благородство и терпение, {name}".

traits.locale_text: "Договоренность между вашей предшедственницей и Лордом Инквизитором требовала доставить меня до Футфола, не далее. Не имею желания более испытывать ваше благородство и терпение, {name}".

languages.text: "The arrangement between the Lord Inquisitor and your predecessor was that I be transported to Footfall and no farther. I dare not take advantage of your generosity and patience any more than I already have, {name}."
languages.original_text: "Договоренность между вашей предшественницей и Лорд-инквизитором требовала доставить меня до Футфола, не далее. Не имею желания более испытывать ваше благородство и терпение, {name}".

traits.locale_text: "The arrangement between Lord Inquisitor and your predecessor required to have me delivered to Footfall and no farther. I dare not take advantage of your nobility and your patience any further, {name}".

"The arrangement between Lord Inquisitor and your predecessor required to have me delivered to Footfall and no farther. I dare not take advantage of your nobility and your patience any further, {name}".

"The arrangement between the Lord Inquisitor and your predecessor was that I be transported to Footfall and no farther. I dare not take advantage of your generosity and patience any more than I already have, {name}."

"The arrangement between the Lord Inquisitor and your predecessor was that I be transported to Footfall and no farther. I dare not take advantage of your generosity and patience any more than I already have, {name}."

"The arrangement between the Lord Inquisitor and your predecessor was that I be transported to Footfall and no farther. I dare not take advantage of your generosity and patience any more than I already have, {name}."

languages.text: «El acuerdo entre el Lord Inquisidor y su predecesora era que me llevaría hasta Paso y nada más. No tengo intención de abusar de su generosidad y paciencia más de lo que ya lo he hecho, {name}».
languages.original_text: "The arrangement between the Lord Inquisitor and your predecessor was that I be transported to Footfall and no farther. I dare not take advantage of your generosity and patience any more than I already have, {name}."

traits.locale_text: «El acuerdo entre el Lord Inquisidor y su predecesora era que me llevaría hasta Paso y nada más. No tengo intención de abusar de su generosidad y paciencia más de lo que ya lo he hecho, {name}».

languages.text: “根据大审判官与前任行商浪人的约定，你只要把我送到落脚港就可以了，无需送到更远的地方。我不敢继续占用你的慷慨与耐心，{name}。”
languages.original_text: "The arrangement between the Lord Inquisitor and your predecessor was that I be transported to Footfall and no farther. I dare not take advantage of your generosity and patience any more than I already have, {name}."

traits.locale_text: “根据审判长与前任行商浪人的约定，你只要把我送到落脚港就可以了，无需送到更远的地方。我不敢继续占用你的慷慨与耐心，{name}。”

languages.text: 「ロード・インクィジターと御身の前任者との取り決めは、我をフットフォールに送ることであり、その先のことは取り決めにありません。これ以上、陛下の器の大きさと懐のデカさを利用するつもりはないのですよ、{name}さん」
languages.original_text: "The arrangement between the Lord Inquisitor and your predecessor was that I be transported to Footfall and no farther. I dare not take advantage of your generosity and patience any more than I already have, {name}."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・インクィジターと御身の前任者との取り決めは、我をフットフォールに送ることであり、その先のことは取り決めにありません。これ以上、陛下の器の大きさと懐のデカさを利用するつもりはないのですよ、{name}さん」

languages.text: "Die Absprache zwischen dem Großinquisitor und Eurer Vorgängerin lautete, dass ich nach Footfall gebracht werde, nicht weiter. Ich wage es nicht, Eure Großzügigkeit und Geduld noch mehr zu beanspruchen als bisher, {name}."
languages.original_text: "The arrangement between the Lord Inquisitor and your predecessor was that I be transported to Footfall and no farther. I dare not take advantage of your generosity and patience any more than I already have, {name}."

traits.locale_text: "Die Absprache zwischen dem Großinquisitor und Eurer Vorgängerin lautete, dass ich nach Footfall gebracht werde, nicht weiter. Ich wage es nicht, Eure Großzügigkeit und Geduld noch mehr zu beanspruchen als bisher, {name}."

languages.text: « Selon l'accord passé entre le seigneur inquisiteur et votre prédécesseure, il était convenu que vous me conduisiez à Castel, pas plus loin. Je n'oserais pas abuser de votre générosité et de votre patience, {name}. »
languages.original_text: "The arrangement between the Lord Inquisitor and your predecessor was that I be transported to Footfall and no farther. I dare not take advantage of your generosity and patience any more than I already have, {name}."

traits.locale_text: « Selon l'accord passé entre le seigneur inquisiteur et votre prédécesseure, il était convenu que vous me conduisiez à Castel, pas plus loin. Je n'oserais pas abuser de votre générosité et de votre patience, {name}. »

languages.text: "Lord Engizisyoncu ile selefin arasındaki anlaşma, Binliman'a sevk edilmem üzerineydi. Cömertliğinden ve sabrından daha fazla istifade etmeye cüret edemem {name}."
languages.original_text: "The arrangement between the Lord Inquisitor and your predecessor was that I be transported to Footfall and no farther. I dare not take advantage of your generosity and patience any more than I already have, {name}."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Engizisyoncu ve öncülün arasındaki anlaşma Binliman'a sevk edilmem üzerineydi, o kadar. Cömertliğinden ve sabrından daha fazla istifade etmeye cüret edemem {name}."
